edge: The original score of the film Bajirao Mastani was composed by Sanchit Balhara.
The soundtrack album of the film Bajirao Mastani was composed by Bhansali.
Sanchit Balhara composed the original score of the film Bajirao Mastani.
Bhansali composed the soundtrack album of the film Bajirao Mastani.
Half of the compositions in the original score are high on classical base.
The soundtrack album consists of ten original songs which are melodious and fresh.

node_2: shreya ghoshal, arijit singh, vishal dadlani
edge: The soundtrack album consists of songs with vocals by Shreya Ghoshal, Arijit Singh, and Vishal Dadlani.

node_2: siddharth–garima, a. m. turaz, prashant ingole
edge: The lyrics of the songs in the soundtrack album were written by Siddharth–Garima, A. M. Turaz, and Prashant Ingole.
The soundtrack album recreates an era gone-by through sounds that are authentic yet operatic and steeped in the classical ethos.
The soundtrack album has portions of the score which are significantly standout due to their use of musical instruments and orchestration that are authentic.
Joginder Tuteja of Bollywood Hungama described the soundtrack as 'high on classical base'.
Joginder Tuteja of Bollywood Hungama gave the soundtrack a rating of 3.5 out of 5.
The Indian Express noted that the soundtrack had a 'balance between restraint and exuberance'.
The Indian Express described the soundtrack as 'fresh, like carefully restored music from Bajirao's times'.
The Indian Express also gave the soundtrack a rating of 3.5 out of 5.
Joginder Tuteja of Bollywood Hungama stated that half of the compositions were 'situational and narrative-based'.

node_2: can be expected to make a good impression on screen
edge: Joginder Tuteja of Bollywood Hungama added that these situational and narrative-based compositions 'can be expected to make a good impression on screen'.
